Description: Lower body sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Wild Goat Style or early patterned pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black (partly worn); exterior, slip mostly worn; part of glazed streaky black band; inscription on interior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0345) (phase 2)
